column1: Family will receive friends on Monday
column3: 2015 from 5 to 7 PM at the Clancy Funeral Home
column5: East Haven and again on Tuesday from 9:30 to 11:00 AM. Funeral procession will leave Clancy Funeral Home on Tuesday at 11 AM for a Mass of Christian Burial at 11:30 AM at Our Lady of Mt. Carmel Catholic Church
column7: Hamden with Committal to follow at East Lawn Cemetery in East Haven.
